1901370.book: Description Of The Eating Of Rasoolullah
1901370.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901370
In-book reference  : Book 23, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 23, Hadith 001
1901370.text: Reported on the authority of Ibn al-Ka'b ibn Malik, that his father said: "The Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to lick his fingers three times.”

1901380.book: Description Of The Eating Of Rasoolullah
1901380.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901380
In-book reference  : Book 23, Hadith 002
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 23, Hadith 002
1901380.text: Anas said: “When the Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) ate a meal, he used to lick his three fingers [the thumb, the index finger and the middle finger].”

1901390.book: Description Of The Eating Of Rasoolullah
1901390.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901390
In-book reference  : Book 23, Hadith 003
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 23, Hadith 003
1901390.text: Abu Juhaifa said: “The Prophet said (Allah bless him and give him peace): 'As for me, I do not eat while leaning on a support'!”

1901410.book: Description Of The Eating Of Rasoolullah
1901410.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901410
In-book reference  : Book 23, Hadith 004
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 23, Hadith 004
1901410.text: Ibn al-Ka'b ibn Malik reported that his father said: "Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to eat with his three fingers and afterwards he would lick them.”

1901420.book: Description Of The Eating Of Rasoolullah
1901420.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901420
In-book reference  : Book 23, Hadith 005
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 23, Hadith 005
1901420.text: Anas ibn Malik say: "Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) was brought some dried dates, and I saw him eat while he was hunched over from hunger.”
